    • Method Detail

      • createCompany

        public Company createCompany(Company company)
                      throws CouponSystemException
        Creates the company. Method receives Company bean. Checks if already exist company with same name, If not performs createCopmany method.
        Parameters:
        company - the company
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException

      • removeCompany

        public void removeCompany(Company company)
        Removes the company. Method receives company bean. Gets all coupons belongs to the company. Uses helper method helperDAO.removeWhere by Coupon Id removes all coupons from tables(Coupon,Customer_Coupon, Copmany_Coupon) removes the company from Company table as well
        Parameters:
        company - the company

      • companyDetailsUpdate

        public Company companyDetailsUpdate(Company company)
        Company details update. Receives Company bean, the company from DataBase by Id. Checks if User tries to update name (different name): -if yes, denies the action -if no updates(overwrites all attributes)
        Parameters:
        company - the company

      • getAllCompanies

        public java.lang.Iterable<Company> getAllCompanies()
        Gets the all companies.
        Returns:
        the all companies existing in Data Base

      • getCompany

        public Company getCompany(int id)
                   throws CouponSystemException
        Gets the company by ID
        Parameters:
        id - the id
        Returns:
        the company
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException

      • addCustomer

        public Customer addCustomer(Customer customer)
                     throws CouponSystemException
        Adds the customer. Receives Customer bean. Methods checks if Customer with that name all ready exists and if yes denies the action. If no Customer with the name creates new Id for the new customer and adds it to the Data Base in Customer table new row.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException

      • removeCustomer

        public Customer removeCustomer(Customer customer)
        Removes the customer. Removes Customers Coupon from data base table Customer_Coupon. Removes the customer from Customer table as well.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer

      • updateCustomerDetails

        public Customer updateCustomerDetails(Customer customer)
        Update customer details. Retries Customer from Data Base by ID. Checks if Admin tries to update Copamany name , denies the action. If Customer Name is the same updates all attributes.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer

      • getCustomerList

        public java.lang.Iterable<Customer> getCustomerList()
        Gets the customer list.
        Returns:
        the customer list

        Parameters:
